Energy Tapping is a carefully","color":"gray"}','{"text":"regulated process that is used to","color":"gray"}','{"text":"draw energy from plants and","color":"gray"}','{"text":"condemned prisoners and as a","color":"gray"}','{"text":"quick and painless, though","color":"gray"}','{"text":"maddening, form of euthanasia.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Use Health Instead of Stamina","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Health Consumed at 1/3rd the","color":"gray"}','{"text":" Stamina Cost","color":"gray"}']},HoldingID:68,Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:6,CustomModelData:14,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUID:[I;2005060373,-2147137501,1370675226,-1345246985],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
